itemDisplayName: 04 - Create a Demo Lab with AD and SQL 2016 AO and Octopus Deploy and WIn 10 client
description: This template creates a Domain Controller and a SQL 2016 AO and an Octopus deploy server and WIn 10 client
summary: This template creates an Azure VM with AD and a SQL 2016 AO and an Octopus deploy server and WIn 10 client
